attributes.action: stop people/resale site selling on tickets for more than their face value.
attributes.background: I have never been to a concert and In all honesty probably never will because of resale site selling tickets at extortionate prices that people like myself cant afford. Tickets for any event should never be sold for more than face value.

rejection.details:
This petition is similar to yours:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/171819
